whyChooseUs.title: WHY CHOOSE US?

about.title: About Old Fox Company
about.experience_title: Experience Adventure with Old Fox Company
about.experience_description_1: Join us for a journey that promises not only breathtaking views but also spiritual growth. Our faith-based travel experiences cater to individuals, families, and groups seeking a deeper connection with their faith.
about.experience_description_2: With years of experience, we understand the needs of our travelers, offering personalized itineraries that inspire and uplift. Our dedicated team is here to support you every step of the way, ensuring a seamless travel experience filled with joy and enlightenment.

footer.description: Discover the world with Exodus: Your trusted travel adventure partner!
